item.title: Plots with Software STATA
item.description: These plots are some of the figures I used in my graduate thesis. For more informatation: DEMAND FOR RESIDENTIAL SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC SYSTEMS: EVIDENCE FROM NOVA SCOTIA Figure 1 depicts the number of SP system installations in NS from 2016 to 2019. Rebate of $1/Watt was introduced in 2018 and the total number of installations in 2018 was 78 compared to 33 in 2017. While rebate decreased to $0.85/Watt on March 26, 2019, the total number of installations increased.
